attributes.action: Put IBD awareness posters in UK GP surgeries and hospital waiting rooms
attributes.additional_details: It has come to my attention that in GP surgeries and hospital waiting rooms in the United Kingdom lack posters raising awareness of Inflammatory Bowel Disease (Crohns and Ulcerative Colitis). Please sign this petition to get such posters in these waiting rooms to help raise awareness for this deliberating bowel condition, its time to escape the stall.

rejection.details: Public awareness campaigns are organised by Public Health England, an independent body.  Please contact that organisation directly with your concerns.
